DOC.brief_title: Pharmacodynamic Differences Between Branded Unbranded Remifentanil Molecules
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction . Several remifentanil product commercialize Colombia never compare clinical setting . Objective . The aim study investigate pharmacodynamic profile innovative molecule remifentanil ( group O = UltivaÂ® ) two unbranded molecule ( group A = Remifentanil Laboratorios Chalver de Colombia S.A. group B = Fada Remifentanilo ) register Colombia . Methods . The investigator carry double-blind , randomize , control trial . The branded molecule remifentanil ( group O , n=29 ) compare two unbranded molecule ( group A , n=29 ; group B , n=32 ) anesthetic induction tracheal intubation adult patient American Society Anesthesiology Physical Status Classification = I without predictor difficult airway . The target control infusion ( TCI ) dose evaluated 6 , 8 10 ng/ml Minto model . Induction complement propofol 5 mg/ml ( TCI ) Schneider model rocuronium 0.6 mg/kg . The primary outcome define difference mean arterial pressure heart rate pre-intubation ( TCI equilibrium ) post-intubation ( maximum measurement within 5 minute ) .
